TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessDataSource extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource

summary.span: 表示搭配資料繫結控制項使用的 Microsoft Access 資料庫。

span.span: Represents a Microsoft Access database for use with data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是搭配 Microsoft Access 資料庫的資料來源控制項。The class is a data source control that works with Microsoft Access databases. 如同其基底類別， ，則控制項會用來執行資料擷取的 SQL 查詢。Like its base class, , the control uses SQL queries to perform data retrieval. 其中一個獨特的特性控制項是，您未設定屬性。One of the unique characteristics of the control is that you do not set the property. 您只需要設定 Access (.mdb) 檔案中的位置屬性和會負責基礎連接到資料庫。All you need to do is set the location of the Access (.mdb) file in the property and the takes care of the underlying connection to the database. 您應該將 Access 資料庫放在網站的 App_Data 目錄中，並參考它們依相對路徑 (例如`~/App_Data/Northwind.mdb`)。You should place Access databases in the App_Data directory of the Web site and reference them by a relative path (for example, `~/App_Data/Northwind.mdb`). 因為不會提供由用戶端 Web 瀏覽器直接要求時，這個位置會提供額外的安全性資料檔案。This location offers additional security for data files, because they are not served if they are requested directly by the client Web browser. 類別不支援連接到 Access 資料庫的使用者名稱或密碼所保護的因為您不能設定屬性。The class does not support connecting to Access databases that are protected by a user name or password, because you cannot set the property. 如果您的使用者名稱或密碼來保護您的 Access 資料庫，使用控制項連接到它，好讓您可以指定完整的連接字串。If your Access database is protected by a user name or password, use the control to connect to it so that you can specify a complete connection string. 您要的資料繫結控制項繫結使用`DataSourceID`資料繫結控制項的屬性。You bind data-bound controls to an using the `DataSourceID` property of the data-bound control. 如需有關如何將資料繫結控制項繫結資料來源控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料使用資料來源控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7)。For more information about binding a data-bound control to data source controls, see [Binding to Data Using a Data Source Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7). 因為控制項是只有一個資料庫產品特定、 一律會使用相同的提供者 — .NET 資料提供者。Because the control is specific to only one database product, it always uses the same provider—the .NET data provider. 基於這個理由，屬性是唯讀的。For this reason, the property is read-only. 使用時提供者，參數化的 SQL 陳述式中參數的順序很重要，任何參數化您在中指定的 SQL 查詢， ， ，和屬性必須符合任何順序相對應的參數集合中的物件。When using the provider, the order of the parameters in a parameterized SQL statement is significant; any parameterized SQL queries that you specify in the , , , and properties must match the order of any objects that are in the corresponding parameter collection. 如果沒有參數的集合上指定，會提供給這些作業的參數的順序必須符合基礎的 SQL 陳述式中出現的順序。If no parameter collection is specified on the , the order of parameters that are supplied to these operations must match the order in which they appear in the underlying SQL statement. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 控制項支援其基底類別支援的相同快取行為。The control supports the same caching behavior that its base class supports. 使用快取來提升效能頁面使用控制項。Use caching to increase the performance of pages that use the control. 如需有關資料來源快取的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 快取資料使用資料來源控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f534a06-3136-4048-bb2e-6563a8238d15)。For more information about data source caching, see [Caching Data Using Data Source Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f534a06-3136-4048-bb2e-6563a8238d15). 下表描述的功能控制項。The following table describes the features of the control. |功能Capability|需求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |排序Sorting|設定屬性設值。Set the property to the value.| |篩選Filtering|設定屬性，以用來篩選資料的篩選運算式時呼叫方法。Set the property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the method is called.| |分頁Paging|不支援的 Access 資料庫的直接分頁作業。The does not support direct paging operations on an Access database. 資料繫結控制項，例如，所傳回的項目可以逐頁，如果屬性設定為值。A data-bound control, such as the , can page over the items returned by the , if the property is set to the value.| |UpdatingUpdating|設定用來更新資料的 SQL 陳述式的屬性。Set the property to a SQL statement used to update data. 此陳述式通常已參數化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |DeletingDeleting|設定用來刪除資料的 SQL 陳述式的屬性。Set the property to a SQL statement used to delete data. 此陳述式通常已參數化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |插入Inserting|設定用來插入資料的 SQL 陳述式的屬性。Set the property to a SQL statement used to insert data. 此陳述式通常已參數化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |快取Caching|設定屬性，以的值，屬性設`true`，而和根據您想要針對您快取資料的快取行為的屬性。Set the property to the value, the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| 如同所有的資料來源控制項，控制項是強型別的資料來源檢視類別與相關聯。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a strongly typed data source view class. 就如同控制項延伸控制類別會擴充類別。Just as the control extends the control, the class extends the class. 類別會覆寫少數方法，以使用.NET 資料提供者。The class overrides a few of the methods to use the .NET data provider. 沒有任何視覺化的呈現的控制項，它會實作為啟用宣告式的持續性，並選擇性地允許參與狀態管理的控制項。There is no visual rendering of the control; it is implemented as a control to enable declarative persistence and to permit, optionally, participation in state management. 如此一來，您無法設定屬性，支援視覺化功能，例如和屬性。As a result, you cannot set properties that support visual features, such as the and properties. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範常見的顯示和更新的情況中使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the control. 屬性設定為適當的 SQL 查詢，並從 Northwind 資料庫的資料會顯示在控制項。The property is set to an appropriate SQL query, and data from the Northwind database is displayed in the control. 因為也指定屬性和屬性設定為`true`，您可以編輯和更新的記錄沒有額外的程式碼。Because a property is also specified and the property is set to `true`, you can edit and update the records with no additional code. 控制項控點加入參數以集合，而控制權會傳遞的參數值，物件第一，後面接著所指定欄位的值屬性。The control handles adding parameters to the collection; the control passes the parameter values for the objects first, followed by the values of fields that are specified by the property. 呼叫方法自動。The calls the method automatically. 如果您想要明確地排序的參數，指定上的收集。If you want to order the parameters, explicitly, specify an collection on the . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access/CS/access5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access/VB/access5vb.aspx#1)]

param.name: dataFile

span.span: The location of the Access .mdb file.

param.span: 該位置可以是目前 Web form 之資料夾的相對路徑、絕對實體路徑或虛擬路徑。

span.span: The location can be relative to the current Web form's folder, an absolute physical path, or a virtual path.

param.name: selectCommand
param.span: 用來從 Access 資料庫擷取資料的 SQL 查詢。

span.span: The SQL query used to retrieve data from the Access database.

param.span: 如果 SQL 查詢是參數型 SQL 字串，請將 物件加入 集合。

span.span: If the SQL query is a parameterized SQL string, add objects to the collection.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified data file path and **Select** command.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來建立新的建構函式資料來源控制項和繫結Microsoft Access 資料庫中資料的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to create a new data source control and bind a control to data in a Microsoft Access database. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_7access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_7access/CS/access7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_7access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_7access/VB/access7vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ConnectionString { get; set; }
.property instance string ConnectionString
Public Overrides Property ConnectionString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ConnectionString : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得連接字串，用於連接 Microsoft Access 資料庫。

span.span: Gets the connection string that is used to connect to the Microsoft Access database.

value.span: OLE DB 連接字串， 控制項會用來透過 .NET 資料提供者連接 Access 資料庫。

span.span: The OLE DB connection string that the control uses to connect to an Access database, through the .NET data provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以搭配僅.NET 資料提供者，以及連接字串，使用是此提供者所特有。The control can be used only with the .NET data provider, and the connection string that uses is specific to this provider. 因此，控制項會公開的連接字串設定，例如屬性，屬性和建構連接字串，在執行階段使用的值為屬性，如果設定。Therefore, the control exposes connection string settings, such as the property, as a property and constructs a connection string at run time using the values of the property, if set. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示屬性ASP.NET 網頁中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to display the property of the control in an ASP.NET Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access/CS/access24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access/VB/access24vb.aspx#1)]

returns.span: 與 執行個體相關聯的 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別類別可以覆寫方法來傳回強型別的資料來源檢視物件。Classes that derive from the class can override the method to return strongly typed data source view objects.

span.span: Data Source Web Server Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public string DataFile { get; set; }
.property instance string DataFile
Public Property DataFile As String
public: property System::String ^ DataFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 Microsoft Access .mdb 檔的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the Microsoft Access .mdb file.
The location of the Access .mdb file.

value.span: 支援絕對、相對和虛擬路徑。

span.span: Absolute, relative, and virtual paths are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是虛擬的絕對或 UNC 目錄路徑 Access.mdb 檔控制項表示。The property is a virtual, absolute, or UNC directory path to the Access .mdb file that the control represents. 如果只輸入檔案的名稱，這表示.mdb 檔案位於目前正在執行的 Web Form 網頁或程式碼相同的目錄。If only the name of the file is entered, this indicates that the .mdb file is found in the same directory as the currently executing Web Forms page or code. 支援與向前及向後斜線的相對路徑。Relative paths with both forward and backward slashes are supported. 例如，`"./test/test/Northwind.mdb"`對應至與相同的路徑`".\test\test\Northwind.mdb"`和`"test/test/Northwind.mdb"`。For example, `"./test/test/Northwind.mdb"` maps to the same path as `".\test\test\Northwind.mdb"` and `"test/test/Northwind.mdb"`. UNC 路徑，例如`"\\mymachine\somedatadirectory\Northwind.mdb"`，也支援。UNC paths, such as `"\\mymachine\somedatadirectory\Northwind.mdb"`, are also supported. 儘管支援絕對實體路徑，您應該避免使用它們，因為它們可以使部署。Although absolute physical paths are supported, you should avoid using them because they can complicate deployment. ## 設定 Access 資料庫的權限Configuring Permissions for an Access Database 使用 Access.mdb 檔的重要層面是正確設定權限。An important aspect of working with an Access .mdb file is to configure permissions properly. 當 Web 應用程式使用 Access 資料庫時，則應用程式必須在使其可以存取的資料具有讀取權限.mdb 檔案。When a Web application uses an Access database, the application must have Read permission to the .mdb file so that it can access the data. 此外，應用程式必須包含.mdb 檔案的資料夾具有寫入權限。In addition, the application must have Write permission to the folder containing the .mdb file. 寫入權限是必要的因為存取會建立額外的檔案，副檔名為.ldb 它會維護並行使用者的資料庫鎖定的相關資訊。Write permission is required because Access creates an additional file with the extension .ldb in which it maintains information about database locks for concurrent users. .Ldb 檔案會建立在執行階段。The .ldb file is created at run time. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 應用程式會執行稱為 ASPNET （適用於 Microsoft Windows 2000 和 Microsoft Windows XP），本機電腦帳戶的內容或網路服務帳戶 （適用於 Microsoft Windows Server 2003) 的內容中。By default, ASP.NET Web applications run in the context of a local machine account called ASPNET (for Microsoft Windows 2000 and Microsoft Windows XP), or in the context of the NETWORK SERVICE account (for Microsoft Windows Server 2003). 比方說，對於 Windows 2000 或 Windows XP 中，如果 Web 伺服器的名稱為 MyServer，MyServer 電腦上的 ASP.NET 應用程式執行的本機帳戶 MyServer\ASPNET 內容中。For example, for Windows 2000 or Windows XP, if the Web server is named MyServer, ASP.NET applications on the MyServer computer run in the context of the local account MyServer\ASPNET. 因此，若要使用 Access 資料庫中的 ASP.NET Web 應用程式，您必須設定包含能夠讀取和寫入權限存取資料庫的資料夾。Therefore, to use an Access database in an ASP.NET Web application, you must configure the folder containing the Access database to have both Read and Write permissions. 當您在 Microsoft Visual Web Developer Web 開發工具建立網站時，Visual Web Developer 會建立一個名為目前的根資料夾下方的 App_Data 資料夾。When you create a Web site in the Microsoft Visual Web Developer Web development tool, Visual Web Developer creates a folder named App_Data below the current root folder. 資料夾被設計為應用程式資料，包括 Access 資料庫的存放區。The folder is designed to be a store for application data, including Access databases. ASP.NET 也會使用 [App_Data] 資料夾來儲存系統會維護，例如資料庫中的成員資格和角色的資料庫。The App_Data folder is also used by ASP.NET to store databases that the system maintains, such as the database for membership and roles. 當 Visual Web Developer 中建立 [App_Data] 資料夾時，它會授與資料夾的 ASPNET 或 NETWORK SERVICE 使用者帳戶的讀取和寫入權限。When Visual Web Developer creates the App_Data folder, it grants Read and Write permissions for the folder to the ASPNET or NETWORK SERVICE user account. > [!NOTE] > 基於安全性考量，Visual Web Developer 也可以設定 [App_Data] 資料夾以便資料夾中的檔案不會由 Web 伺服器。As a security measure, Visual Web Developer also configures the App_Data folder so that files in the folder are not served by the Web server. 請勿在 App_Data 資料夾中，儲存任何網頁，因為使用者會看到錯誤，如果使用者要求網頁從該資料夾。Do not store any Web pages in the App_Data folder, because users will see an error if they request a page from that folder. ## Examples 本節包含三個程式碼範例。This section contains three code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定Northwind.mdb 檔案位於 Web Form 網頁的相同目錄中的屬性。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property to a Northwind.mdb file that resides in the same directory as the Web Forms page. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何設定命名資料庫，這是 Web Form 頁面是在該目錄下的 Northwind.mdb 檔案所在的目錄中的虛擬路徑的屬性。The second code example demonstrates how to set the property to the virtual path of a Northwind.mdb file that resides in a directory named Database, which is beneath the directory that the Web Forms page is in. 第三個程式碼範例示範如何設定Northwind.mdb 檔案的 UNC 共用上可用的 UNC 路徑的屬性。The third code example demonstrates how to set the property to a UNC path of a Northwind.mdb file that is available on a UNC share. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定Northwind.mdb 檔案位於 Web Form 網頁的相同目錄中的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to a Northwind.mdb file that resides in the same directory as the Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access/CS/access4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access/VB/access4vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定命名資料庫，這是 Web Form 頁面是在該目錄下的 Northwind.mdb 檔案所在的目錄中的虛擬路徑的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to the virtual path of a Northwind.mdb file that resides in a directory named Database, which is beneath the directory that the Web Forms page is in. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access/CS/access23cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access/VB/access23vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定Northwind.mdb 檔案的 UNC 共用上可用的 UNC 路徑的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to a UNC path of a Northwind.mdb file that is available on a UNC share. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access/CS/access22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access/VB/access22vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然控制項會公開屬性繼承自其基底類別，因為嘗試設定屬性會導致例外狀況。While the control exposes the property because it is inherited from its base class, attempting to set the property results in a exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示屬性Web Forms 網頁中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to display the property of the control in a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access/CS/access25cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access/VB/access25vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The property overrides the property.
Throws a , in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基底類別中， ，則屬性會取得或設定以分號分隔的字串，以指出哪些資料庫以及資料表中，以使用 Microsoft SQL Server 快取相依性。In the base class, , the property gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency. Microsoft Access 和任何快取相依性不支援的存取權屬性會導致例外狀況。Cache dependency is not supported by Microsoft Access, and any access to the property results in a exception.

exception.span: 嘗試取得或設定 屬性。

span.span: An attempt was made to get or set the property.

related.span: 資料來源 Web 伺服器控制項
